edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task

Class TaskItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task.TaskItem

  • public class TaskItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface that describes behaviors of any concrete TaskItem for the Scrum Backlog FSM.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Enumerator for the designating the specific Type of the TaskItem Object

      • update

        public void update(edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.command.Command command)
        Updates the TaskItem's state using a Command parameter propagated from the UI.
        Parameters:
        command - Enumerator value from the Command class used to update the State of the TaskItem.

      • getXMLTask

        public edu.ncsu.csc216.task.xml.Task getXMLTask()

        Returns:

      • setCounter

        public static void setCounter(int counter)
        Sets the TaskItem's counter variable to that of the intriguer parameter.
        Parameters:
        counter - Number to assign as the current counter value.

      • getNotesArray

        public java.lang.String[][] getNotesArray()
        Returns a 2D string array for Notes associated with the current TaskItem. There is a row for each note entry, as well as, two columns for displaying the note author's name and note contents.
        Returns:
        2D String array containing the Note author and Note text for each note of the current TaskItem.
